title: New Study Shows Vaccination Reduces Long Covid Risk, but Modestly
author: Sumathi Reddy
description: New research shows a modest overall reduction in the likelihood of experiencing symptoms six months after an infection compared with those who were unvaccinated
cleaned_text: May 25, 2022 11:21 am ET Vaccination reduces your risk of developing long Covid, but not by much on average, new research suggests. Copyright ©2023 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
